metadata.subject: Fwd: Alert - TIC Form SHC Deadline Approaching

relationships.description: Richard is forwarding regulatory compliance information to Jeffrey
Richard questions whether the regulatory requirement applies to Leon
Law firm providing regulatory compliance guidance to clients

transactions: TIC Form SHC reporting requirements for foreign securities holdings

analysis.purpose: To forward regulatory compliance information about TIC Form SHC filing requirements and deadlines
analysis.significance: Shows communication about financial regulatory compliance matters involving foreign securities holdings

notable_quotes: not sure if this applies to Leon
The reporting threshold for Schedule 2 is $200 million in total fair value of all foreign securities owned by the SHC Reporter and not held with a U.S.-resident custodian
red_flags: Question about whether regulatory requirements apply to specific individual (Leon)

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - purely regulatory compliance communication

illegal_activity.description: Document discusses regulatory compliance requirements, not illegal activity

public_knowledge.context: Regulatory compliance information about standard financial reporting requirements that would be publicly available

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn forwards a regulatory compliance alert from Sadis & Goldberg LLP about TIC Form SHC filing requirements for foreign securities holdings, questioning whether the $200 million threshold applies to someone named Leon, with a March 3, 2017 deadline for December 31, 2016 data.
